text: The Myles Standish Burial Ground (also known as Old Burying Ground or Standish Cemetery) is a cemetery in Duxbury, Massachusetts. Myles Standish and other Pilgrims are buried here. The Myles Standish Burial Ground is the Oldest Cemetery in the United States. ==References== Category:Cemeteries in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Massachusetts
title: Myles Standish Burial Ground
